name: Bus Simulator 3D 2016
description:
Bus Simulator 3D - the best game-simulator of bus driver in real City!

Do you like driving big vehicles? Then you have to try this Bus Driving game! Smooth controls, realistic vehicle physics and challenging gameplay. Try to be the best Bus Driver in the real City!

It's time to get on board and drive the bus to complete all the routes! Become the best driver of the coolest bus in the City!

Features:
- 12 Cool Buses (from microbuses to coach buses, including articulated)
- Well detailed real passengers and pedestrians with realistic animations
- Unique system of vehicle traffic
- Realistic maps and detailed routes from short to long
- Three types of the vehicle control: tilting , buttons and steering wheel controls.
- Incredible 3D graphics and detailed world
- Realistic physics engine: damage system of your bus, speedometer and refueling control
- Addictive gameplay!

Do you want to feel like a Real Bus Driver? Bus Simulator 3D is for you!
